amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Transportation to accept applications for enrollment in the U.S. fleet within 30 days of enactment and makes certain other technical modifications.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to require the Secretary of Transportation to accept applications for enrollment in the U.S. fleet within 30 days of enactment and to make certain other technical modifications.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bateman amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
